import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; export const CreateProfile = (props) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: "", website: "", location: "", status: "", skills: "", githubusername: "", bio: "", twitter: "", facebook: "", linkedin: "", youtube: "", instagram: "", }); const [displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram, } = formData; return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required fields
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA
Please use comma seperated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInputs} && (
) Go Back
); }; CreateProfile.propTypes = {}; export default CreateProfile;
